title: Sound On: FB Trump Ban, GOP Division, SpaceX
itunes:title: Sound On: FB Trump Ban, GOP Division, SpaceX
description:
Host Jack Fitzpatrick spoke to Boyd Matheson, former Chief of Staff for Senator Mike Lee, and Keith Cowing, astrobiologist and editor of the blog Space Ref.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
